title: Billing - Generate Monthly Recurring Invoice
description: The finance department needs to generate and send the standard monthly recurring service invoices to all clients.

tasks.description: In the PSA tool, run the monthly billing process for a specific client.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates an invoice based on the client's recurring service contract.

tasks.description: Review the generated invoice for accuracy, ensuring all recurring services and user counts are correct.
tasks.expected_outcome: The invoice is verified to be accurate.

tasks.description: Email the finalized invoice to the client's billing contact.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client successfully receives their monthly invoice.
